story_overview: A gentle tale about a curious mermaid who dreams of the human world. Living in a serene underwater kingdom, she discovers a mysterious seashell that shows her visions of the shore. Drawn by wonder, she secretly visits the beach under moonlight, where she befriends a young human artist sketching by the sea. Their brief but magical meeting changes them both, leaving behind a promise of friendship between two worlds.

video_prompts: A tranquil underwater scene filled with colorful corals and small glowing fish. The mermaid, with flowing turquoise hair and a shimmering silver-blue tail, swims gracefully through beams of sunlight filtering from above. Wide shot with gentle camera glide capturing the beauty of her world.

Close-up of the mermaid curiously reaching toward a drifting seashell that glows faintly. Her eyes reflect the light, full of wonder and longing. Medium close-up with soft lighting, creating a dreamy, magical mood.

The mermaid opens the glowing seashell, revealing a vision of the human shore — waves lapping against rocks, a figure sketching by the water. Her expression turns thoughtful and hopeful. Medium shot, smooth transition with a soft light fade.

video_prompts: Night falls over the calm ocean. The mermaid quietly surfaces near the moonlit shore, her tail glistening under silver light. Gentle waves sparkle around her. Wide shot showing the vastness of sea and sky.

The mermaid crawls slightly onto the sand, gazing curiously at a young human artist sitting nearby, sketching by lantern light. The artist doesn’t notice her yet. Medium shot, low angle emphasizing quiet curiosity.

The artist hears a soft splash and looks up, startled but amazed. The mermaid meets his gaze — a silent moment of wonder passes between them. Medium close-up alternating between their faces, slow and steady camera movement.

The artist offers her his sketchbook, showing drawings of sea creatures. The mermaid smiles shyly and touches the page with wet fingers, leaving a faint shimmering mark. Warm, magical atmosphere. Close-up with soft glow and calm music tone implied.

video_prompts: Dawn breaks, painting the sky in pink and gold. The mermaid watches the horizon as the artist waves goodbye from the beach. She smiles softly, then dives back into the sea. Wide shot, smooth camera tilt from the shore to the waves.

Underwater again, the mermaid places the glowing seashell beside a coral rock. The seashell now shows a faint image of the smiling artist. Medium close-up with tranquil lighting and flowing hair movement.

The mermaid swims upward through rays of morning light, her silhouette shimmering against the surface. The mood is serene and hopeful. Wide shot with slow upward camera motion, fading into bright white light to end the story.
